front.title: V5.2 and DPNSS/DASS 2 extensions to the IUA protocol

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for backhauling of V5.2, DPNSS and DASS 2 messages over IP by extending the ISDN User Adaptation Layer Protocol (<draft-ietf-sigtran-iua-09.txt>). The document aims to become an Appendix to IUA and to be the base for V5.2 and DUA (DPNSS/DASS 2 User Adaptation layer) implementation.
